Class CommLinkImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.CommLinkImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, CommLink, Storable
public class CommLinkImpl extends BaseObjectImpl implements CommLink
The CommLinkImpl class represents a single communication link which is connected with one or more field device controllers.
Author:
Douglas Lau, John L. Stanley
